segments.text: Hi , Alex . Would you come with me to supply ? I ’ Ve got to pick up a load of stuff and I ’ m afraid I can ’ t carry it all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Stacy . Let me just grab my coat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I appreciate the hand . I ’ d have to make two or three trips on my own .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ mention it . I ’ m glad to help .
segments.speaker: S2
